00012     BasicController::BasicController(Approximator* approx) {
00013 
00014         this->approx = approx;
00015         dist.resize(approx->getOutputDim());
00016         distribution.resize(approx->getOutputDim());
00017     
00018     }

00024     void BasicController::getAction(Observation& obs, Vector& action,  bool computeGrad) {
00025     
00026         int sampledAct;
00027         double oneNorm = 0;
00028 
00029         assert(action.size() == 1);
00030         approx->doApprox(obs, dist);
00031 
00032  
00033         // Element wise exponentiation and 1-norm, first step of softmax
00034         int i, imax=dist.size();
00035         for (i = 0; i < imax; i++) {
00036             if (obs.getEligible()[i] != 0) {
00037                 dist[i] = exp(dist[i]);
00038                 oneNorm += dist[i];
00039             } else {
00040                 dist[i] = 0.0;
00041             }
00042         }
00043 
00044 
00045         // Pick an action. This loop checks for the rare circumstance that an non-eligible action is
00046         // chosen in a FactoredApproximator
00047         do {
00048             sampledAct  = Sampler::discrete(dist, oneNorm);
00049         } while (obs.getEligible()[sampledAct] == 0.0);
00050 
00051         assert(sampledAct < approx->getOutputDim());
00052         action[0] = sampledAct;
00053 
00054         dist /= oneNorm;
00055 
00056         /*cerr<<"BasicController::dist="<<dist<<endl;*/
00057         distribution = dist;
00058 
00059         if (computeGrad) computePartialsAndFeedback(obs, sampledAct);
00060 
00061     }
00062 
00063 
00064     void BasicController::computePartialsAndFeedback(Observation& obs, int sampledAct, double weight) {
00065 
00066         dist *= -1.0;
00067         //noalias(dist) = -dist;
00068         dist[sampledAct] += 1.0;
00069         // Gradient will be added directly to trace
00070         approx->feedbackGrad(obs, dist);
00071 
00072     }
00073 
00074 
00080     void BasicController::getMostProbAction(Observation& obs, Vector& action) { 
00081 
00082         assert(action.size() == 1);
00083         approx->doApprox(obs, dist);
00084 
00085         // Pick most probable action.
00086         action[0] = 0;
00087 
00088         for (size_t i = 1; i < dist.size(); i++) {
00089             if (dist[i] > dist[(int)action[0]]) action[0] = i;
00090         }
00091        
00092     }

00119     void BasicController::accumulateGrad(Vector& rewards, Observation& newObs) {

00130

00181     void BasicController::reduce(Vector& v, Approximator::StatsEnum s) {
00182 
00183         switch (s) {
00184         case Approximator::DIST:
00185             v = distribution;
00186             break;
00187         default:
00188             approx->reduce(v, s);
00189         }
00190 
00191     }
